short_summary: international repository of independent dispute mediation or arbitration service
description: work of the CORE relates to human rights and responsible business conduct in an international context
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Request for Services: CORE Roster of Mediators

### Procurement Details

- **Contract Title:** Request for Services: CORE Roster of Mediators
- **Procurement Number:** 23-225101
- **Procurement Category:** Service Procurement (SRV)
- **Procurement Date:** 
	+ Publication Date: 2023-05-24
	+ Amendment Date: 2023-07-21
	+ Tender Closing Date: 2023-07-21T14:00:00
- **Contract Duration:**
	+ Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-08-01
	+ Expected Contract End Date: 2024-07-31

### Classification and Categories

- **UNSPC Code:** 80122001
- **Description:** Independent dispute mediation or arbitration service
- **Trade Agreements:**
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

### Geographic Scope

- **Regions of Opportunity:** Worldwide
- **Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)

### Selection Methodology

- **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
- **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
- **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

### Notice and Documents

- **Notice URL:** [None Provided]
- **Attachment 1:** 
	+ English: "https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5844/23-225101---npp---rfso---core-roster-of-mediators---en.pdf"
	+ French: "https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5844/23-225101---apm---doc---liste-des-mediateurs-de-locre---fr.pdf"
